term.title: perspective formula

item.text: A geometric representation of stereochemical features of a molecule or model which appears as a view from an appropriate direction.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2213 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
